Episodes.Title: Our Father
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Clyde Phillips
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: In the Season Three premiere, Dexter's life seems to be smoothly back on track, until he targets a dope dealer who's also in the sights of Assistant D.A. Miguel Prado; Internal Affairs pressures Debra to rat on her new partner.

Episodes.Title: Finding Freebo
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Melissa Rosenberg
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Every cop in Miami is tasked with finding the fugitive Freebo, who is accused of killing the younger brother of Assistant D.A. Miguel Prado; Dexter and Rita move closer to making a big decision about their family.

Episodes.Title: The Lion Sleeps Tonight
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter encounters a fellow predator - but this one is a pedophile; a murder is pinned on Freebo but Dexter knows the truth; Dexter struggles with the fact of his growing friendship with Miguel.

Episodes.Title: All in the Family
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Adam Fierro
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter scrambles to convince Rita that his marriage proposal is sincere and romantic; Miguel's vengeful brother Ramon searches desperately for their sibling's murderer, who was secretly killed by Dexter.

Episodes.Title: Turning Biminese
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Tim Schlattmann
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter hears the story of a husband who has gotten away with murdering two wives for financial gain and tracks the man to Bimini, but Rita has a medical emergency while Dexter has disappeared.

Episodes.Title: Sí Se Puede
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Charles H. Eglee
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter tests Miguel to determine if his friend has discovered his secret, while Rita loses her job and wonders if she's meant to ever have a successful career.

Episodes.Title: Easy As Pie
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Lauren Gussis
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter begins working with Miguel but they quickly have differences in selecting a potential new victim; Rita discovers that Miguel's wife suspects him of an affair; an old friend of Dexter's asks for help in ending her life.

Episodes.Title: The Damage A Man Can Do
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter undertakes to teach Miguel the Code, but doesn't realize he's whetting his partner's thirst for blood; Debra is one step closer to finding the Skinner, but she can't find Anton.

Episodes.Title: About Last Night
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Melissa Rosenberg
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter and Miguel's friendship becomes strained even as Rita confronts Miguel about his suspected infidelity; Debra searches furiously for Anton when it's revealed that he was abducted by the Skinner.

Episodes.Title: Go Your Own Way
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Tim Schlattmann
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: A series of chess-like moves ensues when Dexter and Miguel vie for the upper hand, with Miguel winning Rita's affection by presenting her with a lavish wedding gift; Debra wonders if her relationship with Anton is worth it.

Episodes.Title: I Had A Dream
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Charles H. Eglee
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: Dexter must find a way to get rid of Miguel despite the fact that his friend is a district attorney (and Dexter's best man); Rita discovers that Miguel has been seeing an old flame; Debra finds a new clue to the Skinner's identity.

Episodes.Title: Do You Take Dexter Morgan?
Episodes.Writer: Jeff Lindsay, James Manos Jr., Scott Buck
Episodes.Actors: Michael C. Hall, Julie Benz, Jennifer Carpenter
Episodes.Plot: In the Season Three finale, Dexter attempts to calm the unstable Ramon now that Miguel is out of the picture; Debra is about to receive her detective's shield but is blind-sided with information that could derail her promotion.
